channel.title: aws scp on Darius Hall

item.title: Part 3 - AWS For Personal Use/Learning: Account Level Guardrails
item.description: This is the third post in what is a multi-part series on some suggestions based on AWS Well-Architected Framework best practices focused on setting up an AWS account(s) for personal use and learning. For other parts in the series see: Part 1 - AWS For Personal Use/Learning: Secure Multi-Account Setup Part 2 - AWS For Personal Use/Learning: Identity and Access Management So far in this multi-part series, the benefits of multiple AWS accounts has been discussed and AWS Organizations has been configured to enable that approach.
